FAQ
Q How can you tell in the smithing/Inventory menu
A The name it will have - in the name as Battle-axe the original is Battleaxe
Q Can there be found in loot and shops bandits
A No not yet might do that later
Q Can I make them 1 handed and make them back to the 2 handed
A Yes but it can also be used as a cheat. I might change that later to be Optional
